title: MOOC Design and Operational Strategies for Online Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital learning platforms and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Requires a flexible learning structure considering time constraints of professionals in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can proactively propose discussion topics on social issues at least three times on the MOOC platform.
Learners achieve an 80% or higher assignment submission rate in mobile environments while applying time management strategies.
Learners can improve social problem-solving solutions at least twice through peer feedback and instructor evaluation.

resources: Open Educational Resources (OER) on Social Issues
Platform with Built-in Real-Time Chat Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
